text: Then the prophets Haggai and Zechariah son of Iddo prophesied concerning the Jews who were in Judah and Jerusalem in the name of the God of Israel who was over them.
Then Zerubbabel the son of Shealtiel and Jeshua the son of Jozadak began to rebuild the temple of God in Jerusalem. The prophets of God were with them, supporting them.
At that time Tattenai governor of Trans-Euphrates, Shethar-Bozenai, and their colleagues came to them and asked, “Who gave you authority to rebuild this temple and to complete this structure?”

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0116" class="">also</st> <st data-num="03660 0560">asked</st> them, “<st data-num="04479" class="">What</st> <st data-num="0581" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="08036" class="">names</st> of the <st data-num="01400" class="">men</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">who</st> are <st data-num="01124" class="">building</st> <st data-num="01836" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01147" class="">edifice</st>?”
But God was watching over the elders of Judah, and they were not stopped until a report could be dispatched to Darius and a letter could be sent back concerning this.
This is a copy of the letter that Tattenai governor of Trans-Euphrates, Shethar-Bozenai, and his colleagues (who were the officials of Trans-Euphrates) sent to King Darius.

The report they sent to him was written as follows:

“To King Darius: All greetings!

Let it <st data-num="01934" class="">be</st> <st data-num="03046" class="">known</st> to the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> we have <st data-num="0236" class="">gone</st> to the <st data-num="04083" class="">province</st> of <st data-num="03061" class="">Judah</st>, to the <st data-num="01005" class="">temple</st> of the <st data-num="07229" class="">great</st> <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st>. <st data-num="01932" class="">It</st> is being <st data-num="01124" class="">built</st> with <st data-num="01560" class="">large</st> <st data-num="069" class="">stones</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0636" class="">timbers</st> are being <st data-num="07761" class="">placed</st> in the <st data-num="03797" class="">walls</st>. <st data-num="01791" class="">This</st> <st data-num="05673" class="">work</st> is being <st data-num="05648" class="">done</st> <st data-num="0629" class="">with all diligence</st> and is <st data-num="06744" class="">prospering</st> in their <st data-num="03028" class="">hands</st>.

We <st data-num="07593" class="">inquired</st> of <st data-num="0479" class="">those</st> <st data-num="07868" class="">elders</st>, <st data-num="03660 0560">asking</st> them, ‘<st data-num="04479" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="07761" class="">gave</st> you the <st data-num="02942" class="">authority</st> to <st data-num="01124" class="">rebuild</st> <st data-num="01836" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01005" class="">temple</st> and to <st data-num="03635" class="">complete</st> <st data-num="01836" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0846" class="">structure</st>?’

We <st data-num="0638" class="">also</st> <st data-num="07593" class="">inquired</st> of their <st data-num="08036" class="">names</st> in order to <st data-num="03046" class="">inform</st> you, <st data-num="01768" class="">so that</st> we might <st data-num="03790" class="">write</st> the <st data-num="08036" class="">names</st> of the <st data-num="01400" class="">men</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">who</st> were their <st data-num="07217" class="">leaders</st>.

They <st data-num="08421 0560">responded</st> to us in the <st data-num="03660" class="">following</st> <st data-num="06600" class="">way</st>: ‘<st data-num="0586" class="">We</st> <st data-num="01994" class="">are</st> <st data-num="05649" class="">servants</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="08065" class="">heaven</st> and <st data-num="0772" class="">earth</st>. We are <st data-num="01124" class="">rebuilding</st> the <st data-num="01005" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">which</st> <st data-num="01934" class="">was</st> <st data-num="06928 01836">previously</st> <st data-num="01124" class="">built</st> <st data-num="07690" class="">many</st> <st data-num="08140" class="">years</st> <st data-num="06928 01836">ago</st>. A <st data-num="07229" class="">great</st> <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="03479" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="01124" class="">built</st> it and <st data-num="03635" class="">completed</st> it.

<st data-num="03861" class="">But</st> <st data-num="04481 01768">after</st> our <st data-num="02" class="">ancestors</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07265" class="">angered</st> the <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="08065" class="">heaven</st>, he <st data-num="03052" class="">delivered</st> <st data-num="01994" class="">them</st> into the <st data-num="03028" class="">hands</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="04430" class="">King</st> <st data-num="05020" class="">Nebuchadnezzar</st> of <st data-num="0895" class="">Babylon</st>, the <st data-num="03679" class="">Chaldean</st>, who <st data-num="05642" class="">destroyed</st> <st data-num="01836" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01005" class="">temple</st> and <st data-num="01541" class="">exiled</st> the <st data-num="05972" class="">people</st> to <st data-num="0895" class="">Babylon</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="01297" class="">But</st> in the <st data-num="02298" class="">first</st> <st data-num="08140" class="">year</st> of <st data-num="04430" class="">King</st> <st data-num="03567" class="">Cyrus</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> <st data-num="0895" class="">Babylon</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04430" class="">King</st> <st data-num="03567" class="">Cyrus</st> <st data-num="07761" class="">enacted</st> a <st data-num="02942" class="">decree</st> to <st data-num="01124" class="">rebuild</st> <st data-num="01836" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01005" class="">temple</st> of <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="0638" class="">Even</st> the <st data-num="01722" class="">gold</st> and <st data-num="03702" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="03984" class="">vessels</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="01005" class="">temple</st> of <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> <st data-num="05020" class="">Nebuchadnezzar</st> had <st data-num="05312" class="">taken</st> <st data-num="04481" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="01965 01768">temple</st> in <st data-num="03390" class="">Jerusalem</st> and had <st data-num="02987 01994">brought</st> to the <st data-num="01965" class="">palace</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> <st data-num="0895" class="">Babylon</st>—even <st data-num="01994" class="">those things</st> <st data-num="04430" class="">King</st> <st data-num="03567" class="">Cyrus</st> <st data-num="05312" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="04481" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="01965" class="">palace</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> <st data-num="0895" class="">Babylon</st> and <st data-num="03052" class="">presented</st><n id="2" /> to a man by the <st data-num="08036" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="08340" class="">Sheshbazzar</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">whom</st> he had <st data-num="07761" class="">appointed</st> as <st data-num="06347" class="">governor</st>.

He <st data-num="0560" class="">said</st> to him, “<st data-num="05376" class="">Take</st> <st data-num="0412" class="">these</st> <st data-num="03984" class="">vessels</st> and <st data-num="0236" class="">go</st> <st data-num="05182" class="">deposit</st> <st data-num="01994" class="">them</st> in the <st data-num="01965 01768">temple</st> in <st data-num="03390" class="">Jerusalem</st>, and let the <st data-num="01005" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> be <st data-num="01124" class="">rebuilt</st> <st data-num="05922" class="">in</st> its <st data-num="0870" class="">proper location</st>.”<n id="1" />

Then this Sheshbazzar went and laid the foundations of the temple of God in Jerusalem. From that time to the present moment it has been in the process of being rebuilt, although it is not yet finished.’

“Now if the king is so inclined, let a search be conducted in the royal archives there in Babylon in order to determine whether King Cyrus did in fact issue orders for this temple of God to be rebuilt in Jerusalem. Then let the king send us a decision concerning this matter.”
